name: Airport Police Dog Drugs Sim
description:
Crime cartels and drug lords are continuously eyeing to take over the city, as the town is being plagued by a crime and drug spree, with drugs being imported from numerous countries and regions in to the town by the drug mafia.

It’s time for the cops and police squad to get into the action once more to fight this wave of terrorism throughout the city. With the special ops training and the expert drug sniffing dogs at their disposal, the police are the lone wolf who can sniff this danger out of town.

MEET GUNTHER, THE SPECIAL OPS POLICE GUARD DOG
You play as the veteran of the anti-drug squad, “Gunther”, a dog who has a repute to bust the most notorious crime and drug lords at the time. Once again, he needs to “sniff it up a node” to take this drug cartel once and for all.

BUST DRUG LORDS IN UNSUSPECTING LOCATIONS
Most drug associations are too tricky to bust, as they transfer their supplies from secret and unsuspecting places. Gunther needs to be precise and thorough, sniffing places like parking lots, bus stations, airports and parks for suspects and signs of drugs.

GAME FEATURES

True to life police dog drug sniffer simulator
Roam in various locations to find drugs and bust the most notorious and difficult to trace crime lords
Play in numerous challenges and try to find the hidden supplies as fast as possible to earn higher ranking points
Realistic environment settings and cheeky target placements to the best dogs on duty
